Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Lisa Cash
Reviews.Content: Well. I actually like this phone. The only thing was i didnt recieve an orange door for the phone or the software cd. other than that its a nice starter phone i would definately recommend it to someone.

Reviews.Title: its not unlocked
Reviews.Author: erinnkids
Reviews.Content: THIS PHONE IS NOT UNLOCKED!!!!! IT SAYS RIGHT ON THE BOX "I AM LOCKED TO TESCO MOBILE NETWORK" NOW I HAVE NO PHONE AT ALL!!!!

Reviews.Title: Did not come with 2 doors
Reviews.Author: share
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone, and it did not come with the two door, as noted on the package content. Disappointed.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint
Quad Band GSM 850/900/1800/1900. Talk Time: Up to 3h 20 min, Up to 360 hours
3 MP camera: snap 2048x1537 resolution photos without pixilation. Audio and video playback: plays up to 8 GB external memory stick holds up to 200 mp3 songs or 10 video files
Made up from hazardous-free components (including PVC), a beeping alert indicating a full charge helps to conserve energy, packaging is made from recycled paper from soy ink printing
Package Contents: Standard battery, AC travel charger, Green door, Orange door, USB data cable, Software CD ROM, User manual
3 inch full touchscreen
ProductInfo.Name: LG GD510 POP Unlocked GSM Quad-Band Cell Phone with 3 MP Camera, Touch Screen, MP3 Player and Bluetooth-No Warranty-White
